T06D4081:166b-1: bo dhi satva sam ba ra bing shi ka / bod skad du /
T06D4081:166b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa /
T06D4081:166b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06D4081:166b-4: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa la //
T06D4081:166b-5: gus pas phyag 'tshal ci nus mchod //
T06D4081:166b-6: phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa yi //
T06D4081:166b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khrims //
T06D4081:166b-8: bsod nams kun gyi gter gyur gang //
T06D4081:166b-9: de ni bsam pa dam pa yis //
T06D4081:166b-10: bla ma sdom pa gnas shing mkhas //
T06D4081:166b-11: nus dang ldan la blang bar bya //
T06D4081:166b-12: de tshe de la dge ba'i phyir //
T06D4081:166b-13: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis //
T06D4081:166b-14: dge ba'i thugs kyis rtag par yang //
T06D4081:166b-16: gzhan rnams dang ni bdag la'ang rung //
T06D4081:166b-17: sdug bsngal yin yang gang phan dang //
T06D4081:166b-18: phan dang bde ba rnams bya ste //
T06D4081:166b-19: bde yang mi phan mi bya'o //
T06D4081:166b-20: nyon mongs drag las byung ba yis //
T06D4081:166b-21: sdom pa zhig par gang gyur pa //
T06D4081:166b-22: de yi nyes ba bzhi po ni //
T06D4081:166b-23: pham pa 'dra bar dgongs pa yin //
T06D4081:166b-24: rnyed dang bkur sti chags pa yis //
T06D4081:166b-25: bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang //
T06D4081:166b-26: sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa la //
T06D4081:166b-27: ser snas chos nor mi ster dang //
T06D4081:166b-28: gzhan gyis bshags kyang mi nyan par //
T06D4081:166b-29: khros nas gzhan la 'tshog pa dang //
T06D4081:166b-30: theg pa chen po spong byed cing //
T06D4081:166b-32: sdom pa slar yang blang bar bya //
T06D4081:166b-33: zag pa 'bring ni gsum la bshags //
T06D4081:166b-34: gcig gi mdun du lhag ma rnams //
T06D4081:166b-35: nyon mongs mi mongs bdag sems bzhin //
T06D4081:166b-36: dkon mchog gsum la gsum mi mchod //
T06D4081:166b-37: 'dod pa'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug / rgan pa rnams la gus mi byed //
T06D4081:166b-38: dris pa la ni lan mi 'debs //
T06D4081:166b-39: mgron por bdag gir mi byed cing //
T06D4081:166b-40: gser la sogs pa len mi byed //
T06D4081:166b-41: chos 'dod pa la sbyin mi byed //
T06D4081:166b-43: pha rol dad phyir slob mi byed //
T06D4081:166b-44: sems can don la bya ba chung //
T06D4081:166b-45: snying brtser bcas na mi dge med //
T06D4081:166b-46: 'tsho ba log pa dang du len //
T06D4081:166b-47: 'phyar nas rab tu rgod la sogs //
T06D4081:167a-2: grags pa ma yin mi spong ba //
T06D4081:167a-3: nyon mongs bcas kyang chos mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-4: gshe la lan du gshe la sogs //
T06D4081:167a-5: khros ba rnams ni yal bar 'jog / pha rol shad kyis 'chags pa spong //
T06D4081:167a-6: khro ba'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug //
T06D4081:167a-8: le lo la sogs sel mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-9: chags pas bre mo'i gtam la brten //
T06D4081:167a-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol //
T06D4081:167a-11: bsam gtan sgrib pa spong mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-12: bsam gtan ro la yon tan lta //
T06D4081:167a-13: nyan thos theg pa spong bar byed //
T06D4081:167a-14: rang tshul yod bzhin de la brtson //
T06D4081:167a-15: brtson min phyi rol bstan bcos brtson //
T06D4081:167a-16: brtson par byas kyang de la dga' //
T06D4081:167a-17: theg pa chen po spong bar byed //
T06D4081:167a-18: bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod //
T06D4081:167a-19: chos kyi don du 'gro mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-20: de la smod cing yi ge brten //
T06D4081:167a-21: dgos pa'i grogs su 'gro mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-22: nad pa'i rim gro bya ba spong //
T06D4081:167a-23: sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed pa //
T06D4081:167a-24: bag med rnams la rigs mi ston //
T06D4081:167a-25: byams la lan du phan mi 'dogs //
T06D4081:167a-26: gzhan gyi mya ngan bsang mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-27: nor 'dod pa la sbyin mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-28: 'khor rnams kyi ni don mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-29: gzhan gyi blo dang mthun mi 'jug //
T06D4081:167a-30: yon tan bsngags pa smra mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-31: rkyen du 'tsham par tshar mi gcod //
T06D4081:167a-32: rdzu 'phrul sdig la sogs pa mi byed //
T06D4081:167a-33: snying rjer ldan zhing byams phyir dang //
T06D4081:167a-34: sems dge ba la nyes pa med //
T06D4081:167a-35: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa //
